trans-unit.source: Ansible 2.7 adds a preview-status feature to group together modules that share common sets of parameters. This makes it easier to author playbooks making heavy use of API-based modules such as cloud modules.
trans-unit.target: Ansible 2.7增加了一个预览-状态功能,可以将共享共同参数集的模块分组。这使得大量使用基于API的模块(如云模块)的游戏本的编写更加容易。

trans-unit.source: Ansible 2.7 makes a small change to variable precedence when loading roles, resolving a bug, ensuring that role loading matches variable precedence expectations.
trans-unit.target: Ansible 2.7在加载角色时对变量优先级进行了很小的更改，解决了一个错误，确保角色加载与变量优先级期望匹配。

trans-unit.source: Ansible 2.8 converts this to a list from a comma separated list.
trans-unit.target: Ansible 2.8将其从一个逗号分隔的列表转换为一个列表。

trans-unit.source: Ansible 2.8 features added logging of device interaction in log file to help diagnose and troubleshoot issues regarding Ansible Networking modules. The messages are logged in file pointed by log_path configuration option in Ansible configuration file or by set ANSIBLE_LOG_PATH as mentioned in above section.
trans-unit.target: Ansible 2.8功能在日志文件中添加了设备交互的日志记录，以帮助诊断和解决与Ansible Networking模块有关的问题。消息记录在Ansible配置文件中的 log_path 配置选项所指向的文件中，或者如上节所述通过设置 ANSIBLE_LOG_PATH 来记录。

trans-unit.source: Ansible 2.8 has added an experimental SSH connection for Windows managed nodes.
trans-unit.target: Ansible 2.8为Windows管理的节点增加了一个实验性的SSH连接。

trans-unit.source: Ansible 2.8 has added an experimental option to use the SSH connection plugin to manage Windows hosts. To connect to Windows hosts over SSH, you must install and configure the Win32-OpenSSH fork that is in development with Microsoft on the Windows host(s). While most of the basics should work with SSH, Win32-OpenSSH is rapidly changing, with new features added and bugs fixed in every release. It is highly recommend you install the latest release of Win32-OpenSSH from the GitHub Releases page when using it with Ansible on Windows hosts.
trans-unit.target: Ansible 2.8添加了一个实验性选项，可以使用SSH连接插件来管理Windows主机。要通过SSH连接到Windows主机，必须在Windows主机上安装和配置Microsoft正在开发的Win32-OpenSSH分支。尽管大多数基础知识都可以与SSH一起使用，但 Win32-OpenSSH 仍在迅速变化，增加了新功能，并在每个发行版中修复了错误。强烈建议您在Windows主机上将其与Ansible结合使用时，从GitHub Releases页面上安装 Win32-OpenSSH 的最新版本。

trans-unit.source: Ansible 2.8 has added an experimental option to use the SSH connection plugin, which uses SSH keys for authentication, for Windows servers. See this question for more information.
trans-unit.target: Ansible 2.8添加了一个实验选项，可用于Windows服务器使用SSH连接插件，该插件使用SSH密钥进行身份验证。有关更多信息，请参见此问题。

trans-unit.source: Ansible 2.8 will no longer create a temporary file for AnsibleModule; instead it will read the file out of a zip file. This change should speed up module execution, but it does mean that starting with Ansible 2.8, referencing __file__ will always fail in AnsibleModule.
trans-unit.target: Ansible 2.8将不再为 AnsibleModule 创建临时文件；而是从zip文件中读取文件。这种变化应加快执行模块，但开始Ansible 2.8，引用它确实意味着 __file__ 总是会失败 AnsibleModule 。

trans-unit.source: Ansible 2.9 handles “unsafe” data more robustly, ensuring that data marked “unsafe” is not templated. In previous versions, Ansible recursively marked all data returned by the direct use of lookup() as “unsafe”, but only marked structured data returned by indirect lookups using with_X style loops as “unsafe” if the returned elements were strings. Ansible 2.9 treats these two approaches consistently.
trans-unit.target: Ansible 2.9更稳健地处理“不安全”数据，确保未标记有“不安全”数据。在以前的版本中，Ansible将直接使用 lookup() 返回的所有数据递归标记为“不安全”，但如果返回的元素是字符串，则仅将使用 with_X 样式循环的间接查找返回的结构化数据标记为“不安全”。Ansible 2.9一致地对待这两种方法。

trans-unit.source: Ansible 2.9 introduced the first batch of network resource modules. Sections of a network device’s configuration can be thought of as a resource provided by that device. Network resource modules are intentionally scoped to configure a single resource and you can combine them as building blocks to configure complex network services. The older modules are deprecated in Ansible 2.9 and will be removed in Ansible 2.13. You should scan the list of deprecated modules above and replace them with the new network resource modules in your playbooks. See Ansible Network Features in 2.9 for details.
trans-unit.target: Ansible 2.9引入了第一批网络资源模块。可以将网络设备配置的各个部分视为该设备提供的资源。网络资源模块的作用域旨在配置单个资源，您可以将它们组合为构建模块以配置复杂的网络服务。较旧的模块在Ansible 2.9中已弃用，在Ansible 2.13中将被删除。您应该扫描上面不推荐使用的模块列表，并用手册中的新网络资源模块替换它们。有关详细信息，请参见2.9中的Ansible网络功能。

trans-unit.source: Ansible 2.9 or later is strongly recommended as it enables the new collection delivery system.
trans-unit.target: 强烈建议使用Ansible 2.9或更高版本,因为它可以实现新的收集交付系统。

trans-unit.source: Ansible 2.9 renamed a lot of modules from <something>_facts to <something>_info, because the modules do not return Ansible facts. Ansible facts relate to a specific host. For example, the configuration of a network interface, the operating system on a unix server, and the list of packages installed on a Windows box are all Ansible facts. The renamed modules return values that are not unique to the host. For example, account information or region data for a cloud provider. Renaming these modules should provide more clarity about the types of return values each set of modules offers.
trans-unit.target: Ansible 2.9将许多模块从 <something>_facts 重命名为 <something>_info ，因为这些模块不返回Ansible facts。 Ansible事实与特定主机有关。例如，网络接口的配置，Unix服务器上的操作系统以及Windows框上安装的软件包列表都是Ansible事实。重命名的模块返回的值不是主机唯一的。例如，云提供商的帐户信息或区域数据。重命名这些模块应该使每组模块提供的返回值类型更加清晰。

trans-unit.source: Ansible hostvars allows you to access variables from a named host. Without this we would return the details for the current host, rather than the named host.
trans-unit.target: Ansible hostvars 允许您从命名主机访问变量。否则，我们将返回当前主机（而不是命名主机）的详细信息。

trans-unit.source: Ansible Network *_config modules compare the text of the commands you specify in lines to the text in the configuration. If you use shut in the lines section of your task, and the configuration reads shutdown, the module returns changed=true even though the configuration is already correct. Your task will update the configuration every time it runs.
trans-unit.target: Ansible网络 *_config 模块比较你指定的命令文本 lines 到配置中的文本。如果在任务的“ lines 部分中使用了 shut down，并且配置读取 shutdown ，则即使配置已经正确，模块仍会返回 changed=true 。您的任务将在每次运行时更新配置。

trans-unit.source: Ansible Network modules extend the benefits of simple, powerful, agentless automation to network administrators and teams. Ansible Network modules can configure your network stack, test and validate existing network state, and discover and correct network configuration drift.
trans-unit.target: Ansible网络模块将简单、强大、无代理自动化的优势扩展到网络管理员和团队。Ansible网络模块可以配置您的网络栈,测试和验证现有的网络状态,并发现和纠正网络配置漂移。

trans-unit.source: Ansible Networking ships with a number of network-specific facts modules. In this example, we use the _facts modules arista.eos.eos_facts, cisco.ios.ios_facts and vyos.vyos.vyos_facts to connect to the remote networking device. As the credentials are not explicitly passed with module arguments, Ansible uses the username and password from the inventory file.
trans-unit.target: Ansible Networking ships with a number of network-specific facts modules. In this example, we use the _facts modules arista.eos.eos_facts, cisco.ios.ios_facts and vyos.vyos.vyos_facts to connect to the remote networking device. As the credentials are not explicitly passed with module arguments, Ansible uses the username and password from the inventory file.

trans-unit.source: Ansible Networking ships with a number of network-specific facts modules. In this example, we use the _facts modules eos_facts, ios_facts and vyos_facts to connect to the remote networking device. As the credentials are not explicitly passed via module arguments, Ansible uses the username and password from the inventory file.
trans-unit.target: Ansible Networking附带了许多特定于网络的事实模块。在此示例中，我们使用 _facts 模块eos_facts，ios_facts和vyos_facts连接到远程网络设备。由于未通过模块参数显式传递凭据，因此Ansible将使用清单文件中的用户名和密码。

trans-unit.source: Ansible Playbooks offer a repeatable, re-usable, simple configuration management and multi-machine deployment system, one that is well suited to deploying complex applications. If you need to execute a task with Ansible more than once, write a playbook and put it under source control. Then you can use the playbook to push out new configuration or confirm the configuration of remote systems. The playbooks in the ansible-examples repository illustrate many useful techniques. You may want to look at these in another tab as you read the documentation.
trans-unit.target: Ansible Playbooks offer a repeatable, re-usable, simple configuration management and multi-machine deployment system, one that is well suited to deploying complex applications. If you need to execute a task with Ansible more than once, write a playbook and put it under source control. Then you can use the playbook to push out new configuration or confirm the configuration of remote systems. The playbooks in the ansible-examples repository illustrate many useful techniques. You may want to look at these in another tab as you read the documentation.

trans-unit.source: Ansible VMware modules leveraging latest vSphere(6.0+) features are using vSphere Automation Python SDK. The vSphere Automation Python SDK also has client libraries, documentation, and sample code for VMware Cloud on AWS Console APIs, NSX VMware Cloud on AWS integration APIs, VMware Cloud on AWS site recovery APIs, NSX-T APIs.

trans-unit.source: Ansible Vault can also encrypt arbitrary files, even binary files. If a vault-encrypted file is given as the src argument to the copy, template, unarchive, script or assemble modules, the file will be placed at the destination on the target host decrypted (assuming a valid vault password is supplied when running the play).
trans-unit.target: Ansible Vault也可以加密任意文件，甚至二进制文件。如果将Vault加密文件作为copy，template，unarchive，script或assemble模块的 src 参数提供，则该文件将放置在解密后的目标主机上的目标位置（假设在运行播放时提供了有效的Vault密码） ）。

trans-unit.source: Ansible Vault can encrypt any structured data file used by Ansible, including:
trans-unit.target: Ansible Vault可以加密Ansible使用的任何结构化数据文件,包括。

trans-unit.source: Ansible Vault can encrypt any structured data file used by Ansible.
trans-unit.target: Ansible Vault可以对Ansible使用的任何结构化数据文件进行加密。

trans-unit.source: Ansible Vault creates UTF-8 encoded txt files. The file format includes a newline terminated header. For example:
trans-unit.target: Ansible Vault创建UTF-8编码的txt文件。文件格式包括一个换行结束的头。例如

trans-unit.source: Ansible Vault encrypts variables and files so you can protect sensitive content such as passwords or keys rather than leaving it visible as plaintext in playbooks or roles. To use Ansible Vault you need one or more passwords to encrypt and decrypt content. If you store your vault passwords in a third-party tool such as a secret manager, you need a script to access them. Use the passwords with the ansible-vault command-line tool to create and view encrypted variables, create encrypted files, encrypt existing files, or edit, re-key, or decrypt files. You can then place encrypted content under source control and share it more safely.
trans-unit.target: Ansible Vault encrypts variables and files so you can protect sensitive content such as passwords or keys rather than leaving it visible as plaintext in playbooks or roles. To use Ansible Vault you need one or more passwords to encrypt and decrypt content. If you store your vault passwords in a third-party tool such as a secret manager, you need a script to access them. Use the passwords with the ansible-vault command-line tool to create and view encrypted variables, create encrypted files, encrypt existing files, or edit, re-key, or decrypt files. You can then place encrypted content under source control and share it more safely.

trans-unit.source: Ansible Vault is a feature of ansible that allows you to keep sensitive data such as passwords or keys in encrypted files, rather than as plaintext in playbooks or roles. These vault files can then be distributed or placed in source control.
trans-unit.target: Ansible Vault是ansible的一个功能,它允许您将敏感数据(如密码或密钥)保存在加密文件中,而不是以明文形式保存在playbook或角色中。然后,这些保险库文件可以被分发或放在源控制中。

trans-unit.source: Ansible Vault payload format 1.1 - 1.2
trans-unit.target: Ansible Vault 有效载荷格式 1.1-1.2

trans-unit.source: Ansible Vault relies on your configured editor, which can be a source of disclosures. Most editors have ways to prevent loss of data, but these normally rely on extra plain text files that can have a clear text copy of your secrets. Consult your editor documentation to configure the editor to avoid disclosing secure data. The following sections provide some guidance on common editors but should not be taken as a complete guide to securing your editor.
trans-unit.target: Ansible Vault依赖于你配置的编辑器,这可能是一个披露的来源。大多数编辑器都有防止数据丢失的方法,但这些通常依赖于额外的纯文本文件,这些文件可以有你的秘密的清晰文本副本。请查阅您的编辑器文档,配置编辑器以避免披露安全数据。下面的章节提供了一些关于常见编辑器的指导,但不应该被视为保护编辑器安全的完整指南。

trans-unit.source: Ansible Vault uses an editor to create or modify encrypted files. See Steps to secure your editor for some guidance on securing the editor.
trans-unit.target: Ansible Vault uses an editor to create or modify encrypted files. See Steps to secure your editor for some guidance on securing the editor.

trans-unit.source: Ansible allows Jinja2 loops and conditionals in templates but not in playbooks. You cannot create a loop of tasks. Ansible playbooks are pure machine-parseable YAML.
trans-unit.target: Ansible allows Jinja2 loops and conditionals in templates but not in playbooks. You cannot create a loop of tasks. Ansible playbooks are pure machine-parseable YAML.

trans-unit.source: Ansible allows two different styles of syntax; each deals with path separators for Windows differently:
trans-unit.target: Ansible允许两种不同风格的语法;每种语法都以不同的方式处理Windows的路径分隔符。

trans-unit.source: Ansible allows you to deploy and configure using the same tool, so you would likely reuse groups and just keep the OS configuration in separate playbooks from the app deployment.
trans-unit.target: Ansible允许你使用相同的工具进行部署和配置,所以你很可能会重用组,只是将操作系统的配置与应用部署保持在不同的playbook中。

trans-unit.source: Ansible allows you to use conditionals to control the flow of your playbooks. Ansible networking command modules use the following unique conditional statements.
trans-unit.target: Ansible允许你使用条件语句来控制你的游戏本的流程。Ansible网络命令模块使用以下独特的条件语句。

trans-unit.source: Ansible also allows configuration of settings using environment variables. If these environment variables are set, they will override any setting loaded from the configuration file.
trans-unit.target: Ansible还允许使用环境变量配置设置。如果设置了这些环境变量,它们将覆盖从配置文件加载的任何设置。

trans-unit.source: Ansible also has minimum PowerShell version requirements - please see Setting up a Windows Host for the latest information.
trans-unit.target: Ansible也具有最低的PowerShell版本要求-请参阅设置Windows主机以获取最新信息。

trans-unit.source: Ansible also ships with the csvfile lookup plugin, which can be used to do selective lookups in CSV files from Jinja.
trans-unit.target: Ansible还附带了 csvfile 查找插件，该插件可用于在Jinja中的CSV文件中进行选择性查找。

trans-unit.source: Ansible also supports encrypting single values inside a YAML file, using the !vault tag to let YAML and Ansible know it uses special processing. This feature is covered in more detail below.
trans-unit.target: Ansible还支持使用 !vault 标记对YAML文件中的单个值进行加密，以使YAML和Ansible知道它使用了特殊处理。该功能将在下面更详细地介绍。

trans-unit.source: Ansible always executes role dependencies before the role that includes them. Ansible executes recursive role dependencies as well. If one role depends on a second role, and the second role depends on a third role, Ansible executes the third role, then the second role, then the first role.
trans-unit.target: Ansible总是在包含这些角色的角色之前执行角色依赖。Ansible也会执行递归的角色依赖关系。如果一个角色依赖于第二个角色,而第二个角色依赖于第三个角色,Ansible会执行第三个角色,然后执行第二个角色,再执行第一个角色。

trans-unit.source: Ansible always registers something in a registered variable for every host, even on hosts where a task fails or Ansible skips a task because a condition is not met. To run a follow-up task on these hosts, query the registered variable for is skipped (not for “undefined” or “default”). See Registering variables for more information. trans-unit.source: Ansible believes you should not need another framework to validate basic things of your infrastructure is true. This is the case because Ansible is an order-based system that will fail immediately on unhandled errors for a host, and prevent further configuration of that host. This forces errors to the top and shows them in a summary at the end of the Ansible run.
trans-unit.target: Ansible认为你不应该需要另一个框架来验证你的基础设施的基本东西是真实的。之所以如此,是因为Ansible是一个基于订单的系统,它将在一个主机的未处理错误上立即失败,并阻止该主机的进一步配置。这将错误强制到顶部,并在Ansible运行结束时将其显示在摘要中。

trans-unit.source: Ansible can do much more, but you should understand the most common use case before exploring all the powerful configuration, deployment, and orchestration features of Ansible. This page illustrates the basic process with a simple inventory and an ad-hoc command. Once you understand how Ansible works, you can read more details about ad-hoc commands, organize your infrastructure with inventory, and harness the full power of Ansible with playbooks.
trans-unit.target: Ansible可以做更多的事情，但是在探索Ansible的所有强大配置，部署和编排功能之前，您应该了解最常见的用例。此页面通过简单的清单和临时命令说明了基本过程。一旦你了解Ansible的作品，你可以看到更多细节的ad-hoc命令，以组织您的基础设施清单，并利用Ansible的全功率剧本。

trans-unit.source: Ansible can optimise actions that call modules that support list parameters when using with_ looping. Instead of calling the module once for each item, the module is called once with the full list. The default value for this setting is only for certain package managers, but it can be used for any module. Currently, this is only supported for modules that have a name or pkg parameter, and only when the item is the only thing being passed to the parameter.
trans-unit.target: Ansible可以优化使用 with_ 循环时调用支持列表参数模块的动作。无需为每个项目调用一次模块，而是使用完整列表一次调用该模块。此设置的默认值仅适用于某些程序包管理器，但可用于任何模块。当前，只有具有名称或pkg参数的模块才支持此功能，并且仅当该项是唯一传递给该参数的东西时才支持。

trans-unit.source: Ansible connects to managed nodes using OpenSSH by default. This works on BSD if you use SSH keys for authentication. However, if you use SSH passwords for authentication, Ansible relies on sshpass. Most versions of sshpass do not deal well with BSD login prompts, so when using SSH passwords against BSD machines, use paramiko to connect instead of OpenSSH. You can do this in ansible.cfg globally or you can set it as an inventory/group/host variable. For example:
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，Ansible使用OpenSSH连接到受管节点。如果您使用SSH密钥进行身份验证，则此功能在BSD上有效。但是，如果使用SSH密码进行身份验证，则Ansible依赖sshpass。大多数版本的sshpass不能很好地处理BSD登录提示，因此在BSD计算机上使用SSH密码时，请使用 paramiko 代替OpenSSH进行连接。您可以全局在ansible.cfg中执行此操作，也可以将其设置为清单/组/主机变量。例如：

trans-unit.source: Ansible creates new releases two to three times a year. Due to this short release cycle, minor bugs will generally be fixed in the next release rather than maintaining backports on the stable branch. Major bugs will still have maintenance releases when needed, though these are infrequent.
trans-unit.target: Ansible每年会创建两到三次新版本。由于发布周期较短,小的bug一般会在下一个版本中修复,而不是在稳定分支上维护回溯。重大的bug在需要的时候还是会有维护发布,不过这种发布频率不高。

trans-unit.source: Ansible does not enforce using the same password every time you use a particular vault ID label. You can encrypt different variables or files with the same vault ID label but different passwords. This usually happens when you type the password at a prompt and make a mistake. It is possible to use different passwords with the same vault ID label on purpose. For example, you could use each label as a reference to a class of passwords, rather than a single password. In this scenario, you must always know which specific password or file to use in context. However, you are more likely to encrypt two files with the same vault ID label and different passwords by mistake. If you encrypt two files with the same label but different passwords by accident, you can rekey one file to fix the issue.
trans-unit.target: Ansible does not enforce using the same password every time you use a particular vault ID label. You can encrypt different variables or files with the same vault ID label but different passwords. This usually happens when you type the password at a prompt and make a mistake. It is possible to use different passwords with the same vault ID label on purpose. For example, you could use each label as a reference to a class of passwords, rather than a single password. In this scenario, you must always know which specific password or file to use in context. However, you are more likely to encrypt two files with the same vault ID label and different passwords by mistake. If you encrypt two files with the same label but different passwords by accident, you can rekey one file to fix the issue.

trans-unit.source: Ansible facts, which have historically been written to names like ansible_* in the main facts namespace, have been placed in their own new namespace, ansible_facts.* For example, the fact ansible_distribution is now best queried through the variable structure ansible_facts.distribution.

trans-unit.source: Ansible gathers facts from the BSDs in a similar manner to Linux machines, but since the data, names and structures can vary for network, disks and other devices, one should expect the output to be slightly different yet still familiar to a BSD administrator.
trans-unit.target: Ansible以类似于Linux机器的方式从BSD中收集事实,但由于网络、磁盘和其他设备的数据、名称和结构可能会有所不同,我们应该期望输出的结果略有不同,但对BSD管理员来说仍然是熟悉的。

trans-unit.source: Ansible gathers facts on the hosts in the webservers group, then interpolates the variable “ansible_facts[‘os_family’]” into a list of filenames. If you have hosts with Red Hat operating systems (CentOS, for example), Ansible looks for ‘vars/RedHat.yml’. If that file does not exist, Ansible attempts to load ‘vars/os_defaults.yml’. For Debian hosts, Ansible first looks for ‘vars/Debian.yml’, before falling back on ‘vars/os_defaults.yml’. If no files in the list are found, Ansible raises an error.
trans-unit.target: Ansible gathers facts on the hosts in the webservers group, then interpolates the variable “ansible_facts[‘os_family’]” into a list of filenames. If you have hosts with Red Hat operating systems (CentOS, for example), Ansible looks for ‘vars/RedHat.yml’. If that file does not exist, Ansible attempts to load ‘vars/os_defaults.yml’. For Debian hosts, Ansible first looks for ‘vars/Debian.yml’, before falling back on ‘vars/os_defaults.yml’. If no files in the list are found, Ansible raises an error.

trans-unit.source: Ansible has a graduated maintenance structure that extends to three major releases. For more information, read about the Development and stable version maintenance workflow or see the chart in Release status for the degrees to which current releases are maintained.
trans-unit.target: Ansible的分级维护结构可以扩展到三个主要版本。有关更多信息，请阅读有关开发和稳定版本维护工作流程的信息，或参阅发行状态中的图表以了解当前发行版本的维护程度。

trans-unit.source: Ansible has dropped compatibility with Python-2.6 on the controller (The host where /usr/bin/ansible or /usr/bin/ansible-playbook is run). Modules shipped with Ansible can still be used to manage hosts which only have Python-2.6. You just need to have a host with Python-2.7 or Python-3.5 or greater to manage those hosts from.
trans-unit.target: Ansible在控制器（运行/ usr / bin / ansible或/ usr / bin / ansible-playbook的主机）上与Python-2.6的兼容性下降了。Ansible随附的模块仍可用于管理仅具有Python-2.6的主机。您只需要具有Python-2.7或Python-3.5或更高版本的主机即可从中管理这些主机。

trans-unit.source: Ansible has modules for managing packages under many platforms. If there is no module for your package manager, you can install packages using the command module or create a module for your package manager.
trans-unit.target: Ansible在很多平台下都有管理包的模块。如果你的包管理器没有模块,你可以使用命令模块安装包,或者为你的包管理器创建一个模块。

trans-unit.source: Ansible has the capability to do operations on multi-tier applications in a coordinated way, making it easy to orchestrate a sophisticated zero-downtime rolling upgrade of our web application. This is implemented in a separate playbook, called rolling_update.yml.
trans-unit.target: Ansible能够以协调的方式对多层应用程序进行操作，从而可以轻松地对Web应用程序进行复杂的零停机滚动升级。这是在一个单独的剧本中实现的，该剧本名为 rolling_update.yml 。

trans-unit.source: Ansible has two modes of operation for reusable content: dynamic and static.
trans-unit.target: Ansible对于可复用内容有两种操作模式:动态和静态。

trans-unit.source: Ansible hosts module code, examples, demonstrations, and other content on GitHub. Anyone with a GitHub account is able to create Pull Requests (PRs) or issues on these repos:
trans-unit.target: Ansible在GitHub上托管模块代码、示例、演示和其他内容。任何拥有GitHub账户的人都可以在这些仓库上创建Pull请求(PR)或问题。

trans-unit.source: Ansible includes a debugger as part of the strategy plugins. This debugger enables you to debug as task. You have access to all of the features of the debugger in the context of the task. You can then, for example, check or set the value of variables, update module arguments, and re-run the task with the new variables and arguments to help resolve the cause of the failure.
trans-unit.target: Ansible包含一个调试器作为策略插件的一部分。这个调试器可以让你以任务的方式进行调试。你可以在任务的上下文中访问调试器的所有功能。例如,您可以检查或设置变量的值,更新模块参数,并使用新的变量和参数重新运行任务,以帮助解决失败的原因。

trans-unit.source: Ansible includes a suite of modules for interacting with Azure Resource Manager, giving you the tools to easily create and orchestrate infrastructure on the Microsoft Azure Cloud.
trans-unit.target: Ansible 包含一套用于与 Azure Resource Manager 交互的模块,为您提供了在 Microsoft Azure 云上轻松创建和协调基础设施的工具。

trans-unit.source: Ansible includes integration tests for all Vultr modules.
trans-unit.target: Ansible包含所有Vultr模块的集成测试。

trans-unit.source: Ansible includes logging of device interaction in the log file to help diagnose and troubleshoot issues regarding Ansible Networking modules. The messages are logged in the file pointed to by the log_path configuration option in the Ansible configuration file or by setting the ANSIBLE_LOG_PATH.
trans-unit.target: Ansible includes logging of device interaction in the log file to help diagnose and troubleshoot issues regarding Ansible Networking modules. The messages are logged in the file pointed to by the log_path configuration option in the Ansible configuration file or by setting the ANSIBLE_LOG_PATH .

trans-unit.source: Ansible includes logging to help diagnose and troubleshoot issues regarding Ansible Networking modules.
trans-unit.target: Ansible包括日志记录,以帮助诊断和排除有关Ansible网络模块的问题。

trans-unit.source: Ansible integrates all of these options through a dynamic external inventory system. Ansible supports two ways to connect with external inventory: Inventory Plugins and inventory scripts.
trans-unit.target: Ansible integrates all of these options through a dynamic external inventory system. Ansible supports two ways to connect with external inventory: Inventory Plugins and inventory scripts .

trans-unit.source: Ansible integrates seamlessly with Cobbler, a Linux installation server originally written by Michael DeHaan and now led by James Cammarata, who works for Ansible.
trans-unit.target: Ansible与Cobbler无缝集成，Cobbler是最初由Michael DeHaan编写，现在由为Ansible工作的James Cammarata领导的Linux安装服务器。

trans-unit.target: Ansible库存插件

trans-unit.source: Ansible is a fail-fast system, so when there is an error creating that user, it will stop the playbook run. You do not have to check up behind it.
trans-unit.target: Ansible是一个故障快速系统,所以当创建该用户时出现错误时,它会停止运行playbook。你不必在后面检查起来。

trans-unit.source: Ansible is a powerful orchestration tool, and rax modules allow you the opportunity to orchestrate complex tasks, deployments, and configurations. The key here is to automate provisioning of infrastructure, like any other piece of software in an environment. Complex deployments might have previously required manual manipulation of load balancers, or manual provisioning of servers. Utilizing the rax modules included with Ansible, one can make the deployment of additional nodes contingent on the current number of running nodes, or the configuration of a clustered application dependent on the number of nodes with common metadata. One could automate the following scenarios, for example:
trans-unit.target: Ansible是一个强大的协调工具,rax模块允许你有机会协调复杂的任务、部署和配置。这里的关键是自动配置基础设施,就像环境中的任何其他软件一样。复杂的部署以前可能需要手动操作负载均衡器,或手动配置服务器。利用Ansible中包含的rax模块,人们可以根据当前运行节点的数量来部署额外的节点,或者根据具有共同元数据的节点数量来配置集群应用。例如,人们可以自动完成以下场景。

trans-unit.source: Ansible is agentless by default, however, it requires Python on managed nodes. Only the raw module will operate without Python. Although this module can be used to bootstrap Ansible and install Python on BSD variants (see below), it is very limited and the use of Python is required to make full use of Ansible’s features.
trans-unit.target: Ansible is agentless by default, however, it requires Python on managed nodes. Only the raw module will operate without Python. Although this module can be used to bootstrap Ansible and install Python on BSD variants (see below), it is very limited and the use of Python is required to make full use of Ansible’s features.

trans-unit.source: Ansible is agentless by default, however, it requires Python on managed nodes. Only the raw module will operate without Python. Although this module can be used to bootstrap Ansible and install Python on BSD variants (see below), it is very limited and the use of Python is required to make full use of Ansible’s features.
trans-unit.target: Ansible默认情况下是无代理的，但是，它需要在受管节点上使用Python。只有原始模块可以在没有Python的情况下运行。尽管此模块可用于引导Ansible并在BSD变体上安装Python（请参见下文），但是它非常有限，需要使用Python才能充分利用Ansible的功能。

trans-unit.source: Ansible is an IT automation tool. It can configure systems, deploy software, and orchestrate more advanced IT tasks such as continuous deployments or zero downtime rolling updates.
trans-unit.target: Ansible是一款IT自动化工具。它可以配置系统,部署软件,并协调更高级的IT任务,如连续部署或零停机时间滚动更新。

trans-unit.source: Ansible is available for Solaris as SysV package from OpenCSW.
trans-unit.target: 可从OpenCSW将Ansible作为SysV软件包用于Solaris 。

trans-unit.source: Ansible is available in the Community repository:
trans-unit.target: Ansible在社区仓库中可用。

trans-unit.source: Ansible is developed and released on a flexible six month release cycle. This cycle can be extended in order to allow for larger changes to be properly implemented and tested before a new release is made available.
trans-unit.target: Ansible的开发和发布周期是灵活的六个月。这个周期可以延长,以便在新版本发布之前,能够正确实施和测试较大的变更。

trans-unit.source: Ansible is easy to run from source. You do not need root permissions to use it and there is no software to actually install. No daemons or database setup are required. Because of this, many users in our community use the development version of Ansible all of the time so they can take advantage of new features when they are implemented and easily contribute to the project. Because there is nothing to install, following the development version is significantly easier than most open source projects.
trans-unit.target: Ansible易于从源代码运行。您不需要 root 权限即可使用它，并且没有实际安装的软件。不需要守护程序或数据库设置。因此，我们社区中的许多用户一直都在使用Ansible的开发版本，因此他们可以在实施新功能时利用新功能，并轻松地为项目做出贡献。由于无需安装任何软件，因此遵循开发版本比大多数开源项目要容易得多。

trans-unit.source: Ansible is released under the terms of the GPLv3+ License.
trans-unit.target: Ansible是根据GPLv3+许可协议发布的。

trans-unit.source: Ansible lets you define what “failure” means in each task using the failed_when conditional. As with all conditionals in Ansible, lists of multiple failed_when conditions are joined with an implicit and, meaning the task only fails when all conditions are met. If you want to trigger a failure when any of the conditions is met, you must define the conditions in a string with an explicit or operator.
trans-unit.target: Ansible使您可以使用 failed_when 条件语句来定义“失败”在每个任务中的含义。正如在Ansible所有条件句的多个列表 failed_when 条件，加入了与一个隐含的 and ，这意味着只有当失败的任务都被满足的条件。如果要在满足任何条件时触发失败，则必须使用显式 or 运算符在字符串中定义条件。

trans-unit.source: Ansible lets you define when a particular task has “changed” a remote node using the changed_when conditional. This lets you determine, based on return codes or output, whether a change should be reported in Ansible statistics and whether a handler should be triggered or not. As with all conditionals in Ansible, lists of multiple changed_when conditions are joined with an implicit and, meaning the task only reports a change when all conditions are met. If you want to report a change when any of the conditions is met, you must define the conditions in a string with an explicit or operator. For example:
trans-unit.target: Ansible lets you define when a particular task has “changed” a remote node using the changed_when conditional. This lets you determine, based on return codes or output, whether a change should be reported in Ansible statistics and whether a handler should be triggered or not. As with all conditionals in Ansible, lists of multiple changed_when conditions are joined with an implicit and , meaning the task only reports a change when all conditions are met. If you want to report a change when any of the conditions is met, you must define the conditions in a string with an explicit or operator. For example:

trans-unit.source: Ansible maintenance continues for 3 releases. Thus the latest Ansible release receives security and general bug fixes when it is first released, security and critical bug fixes when the next Ansible version is released, and only security fixes once the follow on to that version is released.
trans-unit.target: Ansible维护将继续提供3个版本。因此，最新的Ansible发行版在首次发布时会收到安全性和常规错误修复，在下一个Ansible版本发布时会获得安全性和严重错误修复，并且只有该版本的后续版本发布时才进行安全性修复。

trans-unit.source: Ansible makes it hard to unknowingly use become insecurely. Starting in Ansible 2.1, Ansible defaults to issuing an error if it cannot execute securely with become. If you cannot use pipelining or POSIX ACLs, you must connect as an unprivileged user, you must use become to execute as a different unprivileged user, and you decide that your managed nodes are secure enough for the modules you want to run there to be world readable, you can turn on allow_world_readable_tmpfiles in the ansible.cfg file. Setting allow_world_readable_tmpfiles will change this from an error into a warning and allow the task to run as it did prior to 2.1.
trans-unit.target: Ansible使得难以在不知不觉中使用 become 不安全。在Ansible 2.1，Ansible默认开始发出一个错误，如果它不能安全的执行 become 。如果您不能使用流水线或POSIX ACL，则必须以非特权用户身份进行连接，必须使用 become 可以以另一个非特权用户身份执行，并且您决定受管节点的安全性足以确保要在其中运行的模块的安全性。可读，您可以打开 allow_world_readable_tmpfiles 在 ansible.cfg 文件。设置 allow_world_readable_tmpfiles 会将其从错误更改为警告，并允许任务像2.1之前那样运行。

trans-unit.source: Ansible managed
trans-unit.target: Ansible管理

trans-unit.source: Ansible manages machines in an agent-less manner. There is never a question of how to upgrade remote daemons or the problem of not being able to manage systems because daemons are uninstalled. Because OpenSSH is one of the most peer-reviewed open source components, security exposure is greatly reduced. Ansible is decentralized–it relies on your existing OS credentials to control access to remote machines. If needed, Ansible can easily connect with Kerberos, LDAP, and other centralized authentication management systems.
trans-unit.target: Ansible以无代理的方式管理机器。从来没有关于如何升级远程守护程序的问题，也没有因为卸载守护程序而无法管理系统的问题。由于OpenSSH是最受同行评审的开源组件之一，因此可以大大降低安全风险。Ansible是分散式的-它依靠您现有的OS凭据来控制对远程计算机的访问。如果需要，Ansible可以轻松地与Kerberos，LDAP和其他集中式身份验证管理系统连接。

trans-unit.source: Ansible merges different variables set in inventory so that more specific settings override more generic settings. For example, ansible_ssh_user specified as a group_var is overridden by ansible_user specified as a host_var. For details about the precedence of variables set in inventory, see How variables are merged.
trans-unit.target: Ansible merges different variables set in inventory so that more specific settings override more generic settings. For example, ansible_ssh_user specified as a group_var is overridden by ansible_user specified as a host_var. For details about the precedence of variables set in inventory, see How variables are merged.

trans-unit.source: Ansible merges the on-device configuration with the provided configuration in the task.
trans-unit.target: Ansible 将设备上的配置与任务中提供的配置合并。

trans-unit.target: Ansible模块架构

trans-unit.source: Ansible modules are executed on the remote machine by first substituting the parameters into the module file, then copying the file to the remote machine, and finally executing it there.
trans-unit.target: Ansible模块在远程机器上执行时,首先将参数代入模块文件,然后将文件复制到远程机器,最后在那里执行。

trans-unit.source: Ansible modules normally return a data structure that can be registered into a variable, or seen directly when output by the ansible program. Each module can optionally document its own unique return values (visible through ansible-doc and on the main docsite).
trans-unit.target: Ansible模块通常返回一个数据结构，该数据结构可以注册到变量中，或者在通过 ansible 程序输出时直接看到。每个模块都可以选择记录自己的唯一返回值（可通过ansible-doc和在主docsite上查看）。

trans-unit.source: Ansible modules provide an easier to use interface than CloudFormation in many examples, without defining a complex JSON/YAML document. This is recommended for most users.
trans-unit.target: 在许多例子中,Ansible 模块提供了一个比 CloudFormation 更容易使用的接口,而无需定义复杂的 JSON/YAML 文档。这对于大多数用户来说是值得推荐的。

trans-unit.target: 常用代码的Ansible网络收集

trans-unit.source: Ansible network resource modules exist for configuration management of the device and resource.
trans-unit.target: Ansible网络资源模块存在于设备和资源的配置管理中。

trans-unit.source: Ansible network resource modules simplify and standardize how you manage different network devices. Network devices separate configuration into sections (such as interfaces and VLANs) that apply to a network service. Ansible network resource modules take advantage of this to allow you to configure subsections or resources within the network device configuration. Network resource modules provide a consistent experience across different network devices.
trans-unit.target: Ansible network resource modules simplify and standardize how you manage different network devices. Network devices separate configuration into sections (such as interfaces and VLANs) that apply to a network service. Ansible network resource modules take advantage of this to allow you to configure subsections or resources within the network device configuration. Network resource modules provide a consistent experience across different network devices.

trans-unit.source: Ansible no longer defaults to the paramiko connection plugin when using macOS as the control node. Ansible will now use the ssh connection plugin by default on a macOS control node. Since ssh supports connection persistence between tasks and playbook runs, it performs better than paramiko. If you are using password authentication, you will need to install sshpass when using the ssh connection plugin. Or you can explicitly set the connection type to paramiko to maintain the pre-2.8 behavior on macOS.
trans-unit.target: 当使用macOS作为控制节点时， paramiko 不再默认为paramiko连接插件。Ansible现在将默认在macOS控制节点上使用 ssh 连接插件。由于 ssh 支持任务和剧本运行之间的连接持久性，因此其性能优于 paramiko 。如果使用密码认证，则在使用 ssh 连接插件时需要安装 sshpass 。或者，您可以将连接类型显式设置为 paramiko ,以在macOS上保持2.8之前的行为。

trans-unit.source: Ansible normally has defaults that make sure to check the return codes of commands and modules and it fails fast – forcing an error to be dealt with unless you decide otherwise.
trans-unit.target: Ansible通常具有确保检查命令和模块的返回码的默认值，并且它会快速失败-除非另有决定，否则将强制处理错误。

trans-unit.source: Ansible offers a set of modules to interact with Vultr cloud platform.
trans-unit.target: Ansible提供了一组与Vultr云平台进行交互的模块。

trans-unit.source: Ansible offers a task debugger so you can fix errors during execution instead of editing your playbook and running it again to see if your change worked. You have access to all of the features of the debugger in the context of the task. You can check or set the value of variables, update module arguments, and re-run the task with the new variables and arguments. The debugger lets you resolve the cause of the failure and continue with playbook execution.
trans-unit.target: Ansible提供了一个任务调试器,因此您可以在执行过程中修复错误,而不是编辑您的playbook并再次运行它以查看您的更改是否有效。你可以在任务的上下文中访问调试器的所有功能。您可以检查或设置变量的值,更新模块参数,并使用新的变量和参数重新运行任务。调试器可以让您解决失败的原因并继续执行剧本。

trans-unit.source: Ansible offers four distributed, re-usable artifacts: variables files, task files, playbooks, and roles.
trans-unit.target: Ansible提供了四种分布式、可重用的工件:变量文件、任务文件、游戏本和角色。

trans-unit.source: Ansible provides a dynamic inventory plugin for Vultr. The configuration process is exactly the same as the one for the modules.
trans-unit.target: Ansible提供了一个动态的库存为插件Vultr。配置过程与模块的配置过程完全相同。

trans-unit.source: Ansible provides an internal data type for declaring variable values as “unsafe”. This means that the data held within the variables value should be treated as unsafe preventing unsafe character substitution and information disclosure.
trans-unit.target: Ansible提供了一种内部数据类型，用于将变量值声明为“不安全”。这意味着保存在变量值中的数据应被视为不安全的，以防止不安全的字符替换和信息泄露。

trans-unit.source: Ansible provides bugfixes and security improvements for the most recent major release. The previous major release will only receive fixes for security issues and critical bugs. Ansible only applies security fixes to releases which are two releases old. This work is tracked on the stable-<version> git branches.
trans-unit.target: Ansible为最新的主要版本提供了错误修复和安全性改进。先前的主要版本将仅收到针对安全性问题和严重错误的修复程序。Ansible仅将安全修复程序应用于两个旧的发行版。这项工作是在 stable-<version> git分支上进行的。

trans-unit.source: Ansible provides many facts about the system, automatically.
trans-unit.target: Ansible自动提供有关系统的许多事实。

trans-unit.source: Ansible provides two modes of execution that validate tasks: check mode and diff mode. These modes can be used separately or together. They are useful when you are creating or editing a playbook or role and you want to know what it will do. In check mode, Ansible runs without making any changes on remote systems. Modules that support check mode report the changes they would have made. Modules that do not support check mode report nothing and do nothing. In diff mode, Ansible provides before-and-after comparisons. Modules that support diff mode display detailed information. You can combine check mode and diff mode for detailed validation of your playbook or role.
trans-unit.target: Ansible提供了两种验证任务的执行模式:检查模式和差异模式。这些模式可以单独使用,也可以一起使用。当你正在创建或编辑一个playbook或角色,并且你想知道它将做什么时,它们很有用。在检查模式下,Ansible运行时不会对远程系统进行任何更改。支持检查模式的模块会报告它们本来会做的更改。不支持检查模式的模块则什么都不报告,什么都不做。在差异模式下,Ansible提供前后对比。支持diff模式的模块会显示详细信息。您可以结合检查模式和差异模式来详细验证您的剧本或角色。

trans-unit.source: Ansible provides various modules to manage VMware infrastructure, which includes datacenter, cluster, host system and virtual machine.
trans-unit.target: Ansible提供了各种模块来管理VMware基础架构,其中包括数据中心、集群、主机系统和虚拟机。

trans-unit.source: Ansible reads information about which machines you want to manage from your inventory. Although you can pass an IP address to an ad-hoc command, you need inventory to take advantage of the full flexibility and repeatability of Ansible.
trans-unit.target: Ansible从你的库存中读取你要管理的机器信息。虽然您可以将IP地址传递给特设命令,但您需要库存来利用Ansible的全部灵活性和可重复性。

trans-unit.source: Ansible release tarballs
trans-unit.target: Ansible发布tarballs

trans-unit.source: Ansible releases a new major release of Ansible approximately three to four times per year. The core application evolves somewhat conservatively, valuing simplicity in language design and setup. Contributors develop and change modules and plugins, hosted in collections since version 2.10, much more quickly.
trans-unit.target: Ansible每年大约会发布三到四次新的主要版本。核心应用的发展有些保守,重视语言设计和设置的简单性。贡献者开发和更改模块和插件,从2.10版本开始托管在集合中,更加快速。

trans-unit.source: Ansible releases a new major release of Ansible approximately three to four times per year. The core application evolves somewhat conservatively, valuing simplicity in language design and setup. However, the community around new modules and plugins being developed and contributed moves very quickly, adding many new modules in each release.
trans-unit.target: Ansible每年大约会发布三到四次新的主要版本。核心应用的发展比较保守,重视语言设计和设置的简单性。然而,围绕着新模块和插件的开发和贡献,社区的动作非常快,每个版本都会增加许多新模块。

trans-unit.source: Ansible renders the provided configuration in the task in the device-native format (for example, Cisco IOS CLI). Ansible returns this rendered configuration in the rendered key in the result. Note this state does not communicate with the network device and can be used offline.
trans-unit.target: Ansible以设备本机格式（例如Cisco IOS CLI）在任务中提供提供的配置。Ansible在结果的 rendered 键中返回此渲染配置。请注意，此状态无法与网络设备通信，可以离线使用。

trans-unit.source: Ansible replaces any string marked no_log, including passwords, with ******** in Ansible output. This is done by design, to protect your sensitive data. Most users are happy to have their passwords redacted. However, Ansible replaces every string that matches your password with ********. If you use a common word for your password, this can be a problem. For example, if you choose Admin as your password, Ansible will replace every instance of the word Admin with ******** in your output. This may make your output harder to read. To avoid this problem, select a secure password that will not occur elsewhere in your Ansible output.
trans-unit.target: Ansible 在Ansible输出中用 ******** 替换任何标记为 no_log 的字符串（包括密码）。这是设计使然，以保护您的敏感数据。大多数用户都乐于删除其密码。但是，Ansible会将与您的密码匹配的每个字符串替换为 ******** 。如果您使用通用词作为密码，则可能会出现问题。例如，如果您选择 Admin 作为密码，Ansible将在输出中用 ******** 替换 Admin 一词的每个实例。这可能会使您的输出难以阅读。为避免此问题，请选择一个不会在Ansible输出中的其他地方出现的安全密码。

trans-unit.source: Ansible replaces the on-device configuration subsection with the provided configuration subsection in the task.
trans-unit.target: Ansible将设备上的配置分节替换为任务中提供的配置分节。

trans-unit.source: Ansible requires PowerShell 3.0 or newer and at least .NET 4.0 to be installed on the Windows host.
trans-unit.target: Ansible需要在Windows主机上安装PowerShell 3.0或更新版本和至少.NET 4.0。

trans-unit.source: Ansible requires PowerShell version 3.0 and .NET Framework 4.0 or newer to function on older operating systems like Server 2008 and Windows 7. The base image does not meet this requirement. You can use the Upgrade-PowerShell.ps1 script to update these.
trans-unit.target: Ansible要求PowerShell版本3.0和.NET Framework 4.0或更高版本才能在较早的操作系统（例如Server 2008和Windows 7）上运行。基本映像不满足此要求。您可以使用Upgrade-PowerShell.ps1脚本来更新它们。

trans-unit.source: Ansible reserves two tag names for special behavior: always and never. If you assign the always tag to a task or play, Ansible will always run that task or play, unless you specifically skip it (--skip-tags always).
trans-unit.target: Ansible为特殊行为保留了两个标签名称：始终和永不。如果您将 always 标记任务或游玩，Ansible将始终运行该任务或播放，除非您特别跳过它（ --skip-tags always ）。

trans-unit.source: Ansible resources are models of desired-state. As such, it should not be necessary to test that services are started, packages are installed, or other such things. Ansible is the system that will ensure these things are declaratively true. Instead, assert these things in your playbooks.
trans-unit.target: Ansible资源是所需状态的模型。因此,应该不需要测试服务是否被启动,包是否被安装,或者其他类似的事情。Ansible是系统将确保这些事情是声明式的真实。相反,在你的游戏本中断言这些事情。

trans-unit.source: Ansible runs handlers at the end of each play. If a task notifies a handler but another task fails later in the play, by default the handler does not run on that host, which may leave the host in an unexpected state. For example, a task could update a configuration file and notify a handler to restart some service. If a task later in the same play fails, the configuration file might be changed but the service will not be restarted.
trans-unit.target: Ansible在每次播放结束时运行处理程序。如果一个任务通知处理程序，但另一个任务在稍后的播放中失败，则默认情况下该处理程序不在该主机上运行，​​这可能会使主机处于意外状态。例如，任务可以更新配置文件并通知处理程序重新启动某些服务。如果稍后同一播放中的任务失败，则可能会更改配置文件，但不会重启服务。

trans-unit.source: Ansible separates variables from tasks, keeping your playbooks from turning into arbitrary code with nested conditionals. This approach results in more streamlined and auditable configuration rules because there are fewer decision points to track.
trans-unit.target: Ansible将变量与任务分离,使你的游戏本不会变成嵌套条件的任意代码。这种方法可以使配置规则更加精简和可审计,因为需要跟踪的决策点更少。

trans-unit.source: Ansible ships with scaleway – Scaleway inventory source. You can now get a complete inventory of your Scaleway resources through this plugin and filter it on different parameters (regions and tags are currently supported).
trans-unit.target: 带有伸缩道的 Ansible船-伸缩道库存来源。现在，您可以通过此插件获取Scaleway资源的完整清单，并根据不同的参数对其进行过滤（当前支持 regions 和 tags ）。

trans-unit.source: Ansible ships with scaleway – Scaleway inventory source. You can now get a complete inventory of your Scaleway resources through this plugin and filter it on different parameters (regions and tags are currently supported).
trans-unit.target: 带有伸缩道的Ansible船–伸缩道库存来源。现在，您可以通过此插件获取Scaleway资源的完整清单，并根据不同的参数对其进行过滤（当前支持 regions 和 tags ）。

trans-unit.source: Ansible ships with a number of handy plugins, and you can easily write your own.
trans-unit.target: Ansible提供了许多方便的插件,你可以很容易地编写自己的插件。

trans-unit.source: Ansible ships with a number of modules (called the ‘module library’) that can be executed directly on remote hosts or through Playbooks.
trans-unit.target: Ansible附带了许多模块（称为“模块库”），可以直接在远程主机上或通过Playbook执行。

trans-unit.source: Ansible ships with lots of modules for configuring a wide array of EC2 services. Browse the “Cloud” category of the module documentation for a full list with examples.
trans-unit.target: Ansible附带了许多用于配置各种EC2服务的模块。浏览模块文档的“ Cloud”类别，以获取包含示例的完整列表。

trans-unit.source: Ansible still supports enable mode with connection: local for legacy network playbooks. To enter enable mode with connection: local, use the module options authorize and auth_pass:
trans-unit.target: Ansible仍支持带 connection: local enable 模式：旧版网络剧本的本地版本。要通过 connection: local 进入 enable 模式：local，请使用模块选项 authorize 和 auth_pass ：

trans-unit.source: Ansible supported network roles
trans-unit.target: Ansible支持的网络角色

trans-unit.source: Ansible supports several sources for configuring its behavior, including an ini file named ansible.cfg, environment variables, command-line options, playbook keywords, and variables. See Controlling how Ansible behaves: precedence rules for details on the relative precedence of each source.
trans-unit.target: Ansible支持多种配置其行为的来源，包括名为 ansible.cfg 的ini文件，环境变量，命令行选项，剧本关键字和变量。有关每个源的相对优先级的详细信息，请参阅控制Ansible的行为方式：优先级规则。

trans-unit.source: Ansible tags the first release candidate (RC1) which is usually scheduled to last five business days. The final release is done if no major bugs or issues are identified during this period.
trans-unit.target: Ansible标记了通常计划持续五个工作日的第一个候选发布者（ RC1 ）。如果在此期间未发现主要错误或问题，则完成最终发行。

trans-unit.source: Ansible task finished
trans-unit.target: Ansible任务完成

trans-unit.source: Ansible tasks, handlers, and so on are also data so these can be encrypted with vault as well. To hide the names of variables that you’re using, you can encrypt the task files in their entirety.
trans-unit.target: Ansible任务，处理程序等也是数据，因此也可以使用Vault对其进行加密。要隐藏您正在使用的变量的名称，可以对任务文件进行整体加密。

trans-unit.source: Ansible tools, description and options
trans-unit.target: Ansible工具、说明和选项

trans-unit.source: Ansible treats duplicate role dependencies like duplicate roles listed under roles:: Ansible only executes role dependencies once, even if defined multiple times, unless the parameters, tags, or when clause defined on the role are different for each definition. If two roles in a playbook both list a third role as a dependency, Ansible only runs that role dependency once, unless you pass different parameters, tags, when clause, or use allow_duplicates: true in the dependent (third) role. See Galaxy role dependencies for more details.
trans-unit.target: Ansible对待重复的角色依赖性，就像在 roles: 重复角色一样：：Ansible仅执行一次角色依赖性，即使定义了多次，除非角色上定义的参数，标签或when子句对于每个定义都不同。如果剧本中的两个角色都将第三个角色列为依赖项，则Ansible仅运行一次该角色依赖项，除非您传递不同的参数，标签，when子句或使用 allow_duplicates: true 在依赖（第三个）角色中为true。有关更多详细信息，请参见Galaxy角色依赖性。

trans-unit.source: Ansible uses variables to help deal with differences between systems.
trans-unit.target: Ansible使用变量来帮助处理系统之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: Ansible uses Jinja2 tests and filters in conditionals. Ansible supports all the standard tests and filters, and adds some unique ones as well.
trans-unit.target: Ansible在条件语句中使用Jinja2测试和过滤器。Ansible支持所有标准测试和过滤器，并且还添加了一些独特的测试和过滤器。

trans-unit.source: Ansible uses Jinja2 templating to enable dynamic expressions and access to variables. Ansible includes a lot of specialized filters and tests for templating. You can use all the standard filters and tests included in Jinja2 as well. Ansible also offers a new plugin type: Lookup Plugins.
trans-unit.target: Ansible使用Jinja2模板来启用动态表达式和访问变量。Ansible包含许多用于模板的专用过滤器和测试。您也可以使用Jinja2中包含的所有标准过滤器和测试。Ansible还提供了一种新的插件类型：Lookup Plugins。

trans-unit.source: Ansible uses Jinja2 to leverage Python data types and standard functions in templates and variables. You can use these data types and standard functions to perform a rich set of operations on your data. However, if you use templates, you must be aware of differences between Python versions.
trans-unit.target: Ansible使用Jinja2来利用模板和变量中的Python数据类型和标准函数。你可以使用这些数据类型和标准函数对你的数据进行一系列丰富的操作。但是,如果你使用模板,你必须注意Python版本之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: Ansible uses Zuul to run an integration test suite on every PR, including new tests introduced by that PR. To find and fix problems in network modules, run the network integration test locally before you submit a PR.
trans-unit.target: Ansible使用Zuul在每个PR上运行集成测试套件,包括该PR引入的新测试。为了发现和修复网络模块中的问题,请在提交PR之前在本地运行网络集成测试。

trans-unit.source: Ansible uses existing privilege escalation systems to execute tasks with root privileges or with another user’s permissions. Because this feature allows you to ‘become’ another user, different from the user that logged into the machine (remote user), we call it become. The become keyword leverages existing privilege escalation tools like sudo, su, pfexec, doas, pbrun, dzdo, ksu, runas, machinectl and others.
trans-unit.target: Ansible使用现有的特权升级系统以root特权或另一个用户的权限执行任务。由于此功能允许你“成为”另一个用户，从登录到机器（远程用户）用户不同的，我们把它称为 become 。在 become 关键字利用现有的特权升级工具，如 sudo 的， su ， pfexec ， doas ， pbrun ， dzdo ， ksu ， runas ， machinectl 等。

trans-unit.source: Ansible uses the pywinrm package to communicate with Windows servers over WinRM. It is not installed by default with the Ansible package, but can be installed by running the following:
trans-unit.target: Ansible使用pywinrm软件包通过WinRM与Windows服务器通信。默认情况下，它没有与Ansible软件包一起安装，但是可以通过运行以下命令进行安装：

trans-unit.source: Ansible uses the cs library’s configuration method if credentials are not provided by the arguments api_url, api_key, api_secret. Configuration is read from several locations, in the following order. The CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT, CLOUDSTACK_KEY, CLOUDSTACK_SECRET and CLOUDSTACK_METHOD. CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT environment variables. A CLOUDSTACK_CONFIG environment variable pointing to an .ini file. A cloudstack.ini file in the current working directory. A .cloudstack.ini file in the users home directory. Optionally multiple credentials and endpoints can be specified using ini sections in cloudstack.ini. Use the argument api_region to select the section name, default section is cloudstack. See https://github.com/exoscale/cs for more information.
trans-unit.target: 如果参数 api_url ， api_key 和 api_secret 没有提供凭据，则Ansible使用 cs 库的配置方法。从多个位置按以下顺序读取配置。该 CLOUDSTACK_ENDPOINT ， CLOUDSTACK_KEY ， CLOUDSTACK_SECRET 和 CLOUDSTACK_METHOD 。 CLOUDSTACK_TIMEOUT 环境变量。一个 CLOUDSTACK_CONFIG 环境变量指向一个 .ini 文件。一个 cloudstack.ini 在当前工作目录下的文件。一个 .cloudstack.ini 用户主目录中的文件。 （可选）可以使用 cloudstack.ini 中的 ini部分指定多个凭证和端点。使用参数 api_region 选择节名称，默认节为 cloudstack 。有关更多信息，请参见https://github.com/exoscale/cs。

trans-unit.source: Ansible uses the ansible-connection setting to determine how to connect to a remote device. When working with Ansible Networking, set this to network_cli so Ansible treats the remote node as a network device with a limited execution environment. Without this setting, Ansible would attempt to use ssh to connect to the remote and execute the Python script on the network device, which would fail because Python generally isn’t available on network devices.
trans-unit.target: Ansible使用ansible-connection设置来确定如何连接到远程设备。使用Ansible Networking时，请将其设置为 network_cli ,以便Ansible将远程节点视为执行环境受限的网络设备。如果没有此设置，Ansible将尝试使用ssh连接到远程服务器并在网络设备上执行Python脚本，这将失败，因为Python通常在网络设备上不可用。

trans-unit.source: Ansible uses the ansible-connection setting to determine how to connect to a remote device. When working with Ansible Networking, set this to an appropriate network connection option, such as``ansible.netcommon.network_cli``, so Ansible treats the remote node as a network device with a limited execution environment. Without this setting, Ansible would attempt to use ssh to connect to the remote and execute the Python script on the network device, which would fail because Python generally isn’t available on network devices.
trans-unit.target: Ansible使用ansible-connection设置来确定如何连接到远程设备。使用Ansible Networking时，请将其设置为适当的网络连接选项，例如``ansible.netcommon.network_cli''，以便Ansible将远程节点视为执行环境受限的网络设备。如果没有此设置，Ansible将尝试使用ssh连接到远程服务器并在网络设备上执行Python脚本，这将失败，因为Python通常在网络设备上不可用。

trans-unit.source: Ansible uses the boto configuration file (typically ~/.boto) if no credentials are provided. See https://boto.readthedocs.io/en/latest/boto_config_tut.html
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供凭据，Ansible将使用boto配置文件（通常为〜/ .boto）。参见https://boto.readthedocs.io/en/latest/boto_config_tut.html

trans-unit.source: Ansible uses the infinisdk configuration file ~/.infinidat/infinisdk.ini if no credentials are provided. See http://infinisdk.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting_started.html
trans-unit.target: 如果未提供凭据，Ansible将使用infinisdk配置文件 ~/.infinidat/infinisdk.ini 。参见http://infinisdk.readthedocs.io/en/latest/getting_started.html

trans-unit.source: Ansible uses variables to manage differences between systems. With Ansible, you can execute tasks and playbooks on multiple different systems with a single command. To represent the variations among those different systems, you can create variables with standard YAML syntax, including lists and dictionaries. You can define these variables in your playbooks, in your inventory, in re-usable files or roles, or at the command line. You can also create variables during a playbook run by registering the return value or values of a task as a new variable.
trans-unit.target: Ansible使用变量来管理系统之间的差异。使用Ansible，您可以使用一个命令在多个不同的系统上执行任务和剧本。为了表示这些不同系统之间的差异，您可以使用标准YAML语法创建变量，包括列表和字典。您可以在剧本中，清单中，可重用文件或角色中或在命令行中定义这些变量。您还可以在剧本运行期间通过将一个或多个任务的返回值注册为新变量来创建变量。

trans-unit.source: Ansible vars plugins
trans-unit.target: Ansible vars插件

trans-unit.source: Ansible vault for password encryption
trans-unit.target: 用于密码加密的Ansible vault

trans-unit.source: Ansible verbosity is -vvv or greater
trans-unit.target: Ansible的动词性是-vvv或更大。

trans-unit.source: Ansible verbosity is -vvv or greater and a change occurred
trans-unit.target: Ansible的动词性为-vvv或更大,并且发生了变化。

trans-unit.source: Ansible version
trans-unit.target: Ansible版本

trans-unit.source: Ansible version 2.3 and later defaults to automatically managing Kerberos tickets when both ansible_user and ansible_password are specified for a host. In this process, a new ticket is created in a temporary credential cache for each host. This is done before each task executes to minimize the chance of ticket expiration. The temporary credential caches are deleted after each task completes and will not interfere with the default credential cache.
trans-unit.target: 当为主机同时指定 ansible_user 和 ansible_password 时，Ansible 2.3及更高版本默认为自动管理Kerberos票证。在此过程中，将在每个主机的临时凭证缓存中创建一个新票证。这是在每个任务执行之前完成的，以最大程度地减少票证过期的机会。每个任务完成后，临时凭证高速缓存将被删除，并且不会干扰默认凭证高速缓存。

trans-unit.source: Ansible version 2.4 and later can manage earlier operating systems that contain Python 2.6 or higher.
trans-unit.target: Ansible 2.4及以后版本可以管理包含Python 2.6或更高版本的早期操作系统。

trans-unit.source: Ansible version 2.5 added modules that make it easier to work with scheduled tasks in Windows. The following is an example of running a script as a scheduled task that deletes itself after running:
trans-unit.target: Ansible 2.5版本增加了一些模块,使Windows中的计划任务工作更加容易。下面是一个将脚本作为计划任务运行的例子,该脚本在运行后会自行删除。

trans-unit.source: Ansible was originally written by Michael DeHaan.
trans-unit.target: Ansible最初是由Michael DeHaan编写的。

trans-unit.source: Ansible will always install the most recent version that meets the range identifiers you specify. You can use the following range identifiers:
trans-unit.target: Ansible 将始终安装符合您指定的范围标识符的最新版本。您可以使用以下范围标识符。

trans-unit.source: Ansible will automatically detect and use Python 3 on many platforms that ship with it. To explicitly configure a Python 3 interpreter, set the ansible_python_interpreter inventory variable at a group or host level to the location of a Python 3 interpreter, such as /usr/bin/python3. The default interpreter path may also be set in ansible.cfg.
trans-unit.target: Ansible将在其附带的许多平台上自动检测和使用Python 3。要显式配置Python 3解释器，请将组或主机级别的 ansible_python_interpreter 库存变量设置为Python 3解释器的位置，例如/ usr / bin / python3。还可以在 ansible.cfg 中设置默认解释器路径。

trans-unit.source: Ansible will automatically reboot the remote host if it is required and continue to install updates after the reboot.
trans-unit.target: 如果需要,Ansible会自动重启远程主机,重启后继续安装更新。

trans-unit.source: Ansible will be unable to use the connection user unless auth is Kerberos with credential delegation or CredSSP, or become is used on the task.
trans-unit.target: Ansible将无法使用连接用户,除非任务上使用的是带有凭证委托的Kerberos或CredSSP的auth,或者成为。

trans-unit.source: Ansible will not issue this reboot but will let you know when it is required.
trans-unit.target: Ansible不会发出这种重启,但会在需要重启时让你知道。

trans-unit.source: Ansible will not support Python 2.4 or 2.5 on the target hosts anymore. Going forward, Python 2.6+ will be required on targets, as already is the case on the controller.
trans-unit.target: Ansible将不再支持目标主机上的Python 2.4或2.5。今后,目标主机上将需要Python 2.6+,控制器上也是如此。

trans-unit.source: Ansible works against multiple managed nodes or “hosts” in your infrastructure at the same time, using a list or group of lists know as inventory. Once your inventory is defined, you use patterns to select the hosts or groups you want Ansible to run against.
trans-unit.target: Ansible使用称为清单的一个列表或一组列表，同时针对基础架构中的多个受管节点或“主机”进行工作。定义清单后，您可以使用模式来选择要与Ansible一起运行的主机或组。

trans-unit.source: Ansible works with Python version 3.5 and above only.
trans-unit.target: Ansible仅适用于Python 3.5及以上版本。

trans-unit.source: Ansible’s “Network Fact modules” gather information from the system and store the results in facts prefixed with ansible_net_. The data collected by these modules is documented in the Return Values section of the module docs, in this case arista.eos.eos_facts and vyos.vyos.vyos_facts. We can use the facts, such as ansible_net_version late on in the “Display some facts” task.
trans-unit.target: Ansible的“网络事实模块”从系统收集信息，并将结果存储在以 ansible_net_ 为前缀的事实中。这些模块收集的数据记录在模块文档的“ Return Values 部分中，在本例中为arista.eos.eos_facts和vyos.vyos.vyos_facts。我们可以在“显示一些事实”任务中 ansible_net_version 使用事实，例如ansible_net_version。

We can use the facts, such as ansible_net_version late on in the “Display some facts” task.

trans-unit.source: Ansible’s Meraki modules do not allow for manipulating data. For example, you may need to insert a rule in the middle of a firewall ruleset. Ansible and the Meraki modules lack a way to directly merge to manipulate data. However, a playlist can use a few tasks to split the list where you need to insert a rule and then merge them together again with the new rule added. The steps involved are as follows:
trans-unit.target: Ansible的Meraki模块不允许处理数据。例如，您可能需要在防火墙规则集中插入一条规则。Ansible和Meraki模块缺少直接合并以处理数据的方法。但是，播放列表可以使用一些任务将列表拆分到需要插入规则的位置，然后在添加新规则的情况下将它们再次合并在一起。涉及的步骤如下：

trans-unit.source: Ansible’s Meraki modules will often fail if improper or incompatible parameters are specified. However, there will likely be scenarios where the module accepts the information but the Meraki API rejects the data. If this happens, the error will be returned in the body field for HTTP status of 400 return code.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定了不正确或不兼容的参数，Ansible的Meraki模块通常会失败。但是，在某些情况下，模块会接受信息，但Meraki API会拒绝数据。如果发生这种情况，将在 body 字段中针对400返回码的HTTP状态返回错误。

trans-unit.source: Ansible’s Meraki modules will stop supporting camel case output in Ansible 2.13. Please update your playbooks.
trans-unit.target: Ansible的Meraki模块将在Ansible 2.13中停止支持骆驼箱输出。请更新您的剧本。

trans-unit.source: Ansible’s Windows support relies on a few standard variables to indicate the username, password, and connection type of the remote hosts. These variables are most easily set up in the inventory, but can be set on the host_vars/ group_vars level.
trans-unit.target: Ansible的Windows支持依赖于一些标准变量来指示远程主机的用户名，密码和连接类型。这些变量最容易在清单中设置，但可以在 host_vars / group_vars 级别上设置。

trans-unit.source: Ansible’s approach to configuration – separating variables from tasks, keeping your playbooks from turning into arbitrary code with nested conditionals - results in more streamlined and auditable configuration rules because there are fewer decision points to track.
trans-unit.target: Ansible的配置方法-将变量与任务分离，防止您的剧本变成带有嵌套条件的任意代码-导致更简化和可审核的配置规则，因为要跟踪的决策点更少。

trans-unit.source: Ansible’s main goals are simplicity and ease-of-use. It also has a strong focus on security and reliability, featuring a minimum of moving parts, usage of OpenSSH for transport (with other transports and pull modes as alternatives), and a language that is designed around auditability by humans–even those not familiar with the program.
trans-unit.target: Ansible的主要目标是简单和易用。它还非常关注安全性和可靠性，其特点是活动部件最少，使用OpenSSH进行运输（使用其他运输方式和拉动模式作为替代方案）以及一种围绕人员（即使是不熟悉的人）可审核性设计的语言。该程序。

trans-unit.source: Ansible’s own configuration settings nor the execution of any other plugins, including lookups, filters, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Ansible自己的配置设置，也不执行任何其他插件，包括查找，过滤器等。

trans-unit.source: Ansible’s release cycles are usually about four months long. Due to this short release cycle, minor bugs will generally be fixed in the next release versus maintaining backports on the stable branch. Major bugs will still have maintenance releases when needed, though these are infrequent.
trans-unit.target: Ansible的发布周期通常约为四个月。由于发行周期短，与在稳定分支上保持反向移植相比，通常会在下一发行版中修复一些小错误。必要时，主要错误仍将具有维护版本，尽管这种情况很少见。

You can use any computer that has a Python installation as a control node - laptops, shared desktops, and servers can all run Ansible. However, you cannot use a Windows machine as a control node. You can have multiple control nodes.

trans-unit.source: Any machine with Ansible installed. You can run commands and playbooks, invoking /usr/bin/ansible or /usr/bin/ansible-playbook, from any control node. You can have multiple control nodes.

trans-unit.source: Application state. If vSphere HA is enabled and the vm is configured for Application Monitoring and this field’s value is appStateNeedReset then HA will attempt immediately reset the virtual machine. There are some system conditions which may delay the immediate reset. The immediate reset will be performed as soon as allowed by vSphere HA and ESX. If during these conditions the value is changed to appStateOk the reset will be cancelled.
trans-unit.target: 应用程序状态。如果启用了vSphere HA，并且为应用程序监视配置了vm，并且此字段的值为 appStateNeedReset ,则HA将尝试立即重置虚拟机。有些系统条件可能会延迟立即复位。立即重置将在vSphere HA和ESX允许的情况下尽快执行。如果在这些情况下将值更改为 appStateOk ,则重置将被取消。

trans-unit.source: Aruba configurations use a simple block indent file syntax for segmenting configuration into sections. This module provides an implementation for working with Aruba configuration sections in a deterministic way.

trans-unit.source: As Exoscale DNS uses the same API key and secret for all services, we reuse the config used for Exscale Compute based on CloudStack. The config is read from several locations, in the following order. The CLOUDSTACK_KEY, CLOUDSTACK_SECRET environment variables. A CLOUDSTACK_CONFIG environment variable pointing to an .ini file, A cloudstack.ini file in the current working directory. A .cloudstack.ini file in the users home directory. Optionally multiple credentials and endpoints can be specified using ini sections in cloudstack.ini. Use the argument api_region to select the section name, default section is cloudstack.
trans-unit.target: 由于Exoscale DNS对所有服务使用相同的API密钥和机密，因此我们将基于CloudStack的用于Exscale Compute的配置重复使用。从多个位置按以下顺序读取配置。该 CLOUDSTACK_KEY ， CLOUDSTACK_SECRET 环境变量。一个 CLOUDSTACK_CONFIG 环境变量，它指向一个 .ini 文件，即当前工作目录中的一个 cloudstack.ini 文件。一个 .cloudstack.ini 在用户的主目录文件。（可选）可以使用 cloudstack.ini 中的 ini部分指定多个凭证和端点。使用参数 api_region 选择节名称，默认节为 cloudstack 。

trans-unit.source: As NX-OS allows configuring a rule again with different sequence numbers, the user is expected to provide sequence numbers for the access control entries to preserve idempotency. If no sequence number is given, the rule will be added as a new rule by the device.
trans-unit.target: 由于NX-OS允许用不同的序列号再次配置规则,因此希望用户为访问控制条目提供序列号以保持幂等性。如果没有提供序列号,该规则将被设备作为新规则添加。

trans-unit.source: As WinRM runs over the HTTP protocol, using HTTPS means that the TLS protocol is used to encrypt the WinRM messages. TLS will automatically attempt to negotiate the best protocol and cipher suite that is available to both the client and the server. If a match cannot be found then Ansible will error out with a message similar to:
trans-unit.target: 由于WinRM是通过HTTP协议运行的,使用HTTPS意味着使用TLS协议来加密WinRM的消息。TLS会自动尝试协商客户端和服务器都可用的最佳协议和密码套件。如果找不到匹配的协议,那么Ansible就会出错,出现类似的消息。

trans-unit.source: As a contributor and user, you should be able to use all the methods under the NetconfBase class if your device supports standard NETCONF. You can contribute a new plugin if the device you are working with has a vendor specific NETCONF RPC. To support a vendor specific NETCONF RPC, add the implementation in the network OS specific NETCONF plugin.
trans-unit.target: 作为贡献者和用户，如果您的设备支持标准NETCONF ，则应该能够使用 NetconfBase 类下的所有方法。如果您使用的设备具有特定于供应商的NETCONF RPC，则可以贡献一个新插件。要支持特定于供应商的NETCONF RPC，请在特定于网络操作系统的NETCONF插件中添加实现。

trans-unit.source: As a general security best practice, you should avoid allowing accounts without passwords.

trans-unit.source: As a reminder passwords should never be stored in plain text. For information on encrypting your passwords and other secrets with Ansible Vault, see Ansible Vault.
trans-unit.target: 提醒您，永远不要以纯文本形式存储密码。有关使用Ansible Vault加密密码和其他机密的信息，请参阅Ansible Vault。

trans-unit.source: As a reminder, the various YAML files contain just keys and values:

trans-unit.source: As a result, if you use with_dict to return keys with templatable values, your templates may no longer work as expected in Ansible 2.9.

trans-unit.source: As a safeguard, without force, hpilo_boot will refuse to reboot a server that is already running.

trans-unit.source: As a simple example we are going to make a hybrid fileglob lookup plugin.
trans-unit.target: 作为一个简单的示例，我们将制作一个混合 fileglob 查找插件。

trans-unit.source: As a user, use RUNNING to keep a machine "on" and TERMINATED to turn a machine off .
trans-unit.target: 作为用户,使用 "运行 "来保持机器 "开启",使用 "终止 "来关闭机器 。

trans-unit.source: As all lookups, this runs on the Ansible host as the user running the playbook, and “become” does not apply, the target file must be readable by the playbook user, or, if it does not exist, the playbook user must have sufficient privileges to create it. (So, for example, attempts to write into areas such as /etc will fail unless the entire playbook is being run as root).
trans-unit.target: 与所有查找一样，此操作在运行剧本的用户上在Ansible主机上运行，​​并且“ become”不适用，目标文件必须可由剧本用户读取，或者，如果目标文件不存在，则剧本用户必须具有足够的权限创建它的特权。（因此，例如，除非以根用户身份运行整个剧本，否则尝试写入/ etc等区域将失败。）

trans-unit.source: As all lookups, when fed relative paths it will try use the current task’s location first and go up the chain to the containing role/play/include/etc’s location.
trans-unit.target: 与所有查找一样，当馈入相对路径时，它将尝试首先使用当前任务的位置，并将链向上转到包含角色/播放/包含/等的位置。

trans-unit.source: As already referenced in the variables section, Ansible uses Jinja2 templating to enable dynamic expressions and access to variables. Ansible greatly expands the number of filters and tests available, as well as adding a new plugin type: lookups.
trans-unit.target: 正如在变量部分已经提到的,Ansible使用Jinja2模板来实现动态表达式和对变量的访问。Ansible极大地扩展了可用的过滤器和测试的数量,同时还增加了一个新的插件类型:查找。

trans-unit.source: As also mentioned above, a good way to keep your staging (or testing) and production environments separate is to use a separate inventory file for staging and production. This way you pick with -i what you are targeting. Keeping them all in one file can lead to surprises!
trans-unit.target: 如上所述,保持暂存(或测试)和生产环境分开的一个好方法是为暂存和生产环境使用一个单独的清单文件。这样你就可以用-i选择你的目标。把它们都放在一个文件中会导致意外的发生!

trans-unit.source: As of Ansible 2.8, we’re encouraging everyone to move from the gce module to the gcp_compute_instance module. The gcp_compute_instance module has better support for all of GCP’s features, fewer dependencies, more flexibility, and better supports GCP’s authentication systems.
trans-unit.target: 作为Ansible 2.8的，我们鼓励大家从移动 gce 模块到 gcp_compute_instance 模块。该 gcp_compute_instance 模块对所有的GCP的功能，更少的依赖，更多的灵活性，更好的支持更好的支持，和GCP的认证系统。

trans-unit.source: As of version 2.6, Ansible supports become for privilege escalation (entering enable mode or privileged EXEC mode) on all Ansible-maintained platforms that support enable mode. Using become replaces the authorize and auth_pass options in a provider dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 从2.6版开始，Ansible支持 become 在所有支持 enable 模式的Ansible维护平台上的特权升级（进入 enable 模式或特权EXEC模式）。使用 become 替换 provider 字典中的 authorize 和 auth_pass 选项。

trans-unit.source: As of version 2.6, Ansible supports become for privilege escalation (entering enable mode or privileged EXEC mode) on all Ansible-maintained network platforms that support enable mode. Using become replaces the authorize and auth_pass options in a provider dictionary.
trans-unit.target: 从2.6版开始，Ansible支持 become 在所有支持 enable 模式的Ansible维护的网络平台上进行特权升级（进入 enable 模式或特权EXEC模式）。使用 become 替换 provider 字典中的 authorize 和 auth_pass 选项。

trans-unit.source: As originally designed, Ansible modules are shipped to and run on the remote target(s), however the ACI modules (like most network-related modules) do not run on the network devices or controller (in this case the APIC), but they talk directly to the APIC’s REST interface.
trans-unit.target: 按照最初的设计，Ansible模块可以运到远程目标并在远程目标上运行，但是ACI模块（像大多数与网络相关的模块一样）不在网络设备或控制器（在本例中为APIC）上运行，但是它们直接与APIC的REST接口对话。

trans-unit.source: As part of fault injection, when clients send requests to a backend service, delays can be introduced by Loadbalancer on a percentage of requests before sending those request to the backend service. Similarly requests from clients can be aborted by the Loadbalancer for a percentage of requests.
trans-unit.target: 作为故障注入的一部分,当客户端向后端服务发送请求时,在向后端服务发送这些请求之前,Loadbalancer可以对一定比例的请求进行延迟。同样,来自客户端的请求也可以被Loadbalancer对一定比例的请求进行中止。

trans-unit.source: As part of the TLS protocol, the certificate is validated to ensure the host matches the subject and the client trusts the issuer of the server certificate. When using a self-signed certificate or setting ansible_winrm_server_cert_validation: ignore these security mechanisms are bypassed. While self signed certificates will always need the ignore flag, certificates that have been issued from a certificate authority can still be validated.
trans-unit.target: 作为TLS协议的一部分，将对证书进行验证，以确保主机与主题匹配，并且客户端信任服务器证书的颁发者。使用自签名证书或设置 ansible_winrm_server_cert_validation: ignore 这些安全性机制。尽管自签名证书将始终需要使用 ignore 标志，但是仍可以验证从证书颁发机构颁发的证书。

trans-unit.source: As per 01 Dec 2018, Bitbucket has dropped support for TLSv1 and TLSv1.1 connections. As such, if the underlying system still uses a Python version below 2.7.9, you will have issues checking out bitbucket repositories. See https://bitbucket.org/blog/deprecating-tlsv1-tlsv1-1-2018-12-01.
trans-unit.target: 从2018年12月1日开始，Bitbucket不再支持TLSv1和TLSv1.1连接。因此，如果基础系统仍使用低于2.7.9的Python版本，则在检查位存储库时会遇到问题。参见https://bitbucket.org/blog/deprecating-tlsv1-tlsv1-1-2018-12-01。

trans-unit.source: As seen above each task is now prepended with the role name, in this case system-demo. trans-unit.source: As we’ve mentioned, modules should be idempotent and can relay when they have made a change on the remote system. Playbooks recognize this and have a basic event system that can be used to respond to change.
trans-unit.target: 正如我们已经提到的，模块应该是幂等的，并且可以在远程系统上进行更改时进行中继。剧本认识到这一点，并拥有可用于响应变化的基本事件系统。

trans-unit.source: As well as being defined in the ansible.cfg file, these server options can be defined as an environment variable. The environment variable is in the form ANSIBLE_GALAXY_SERVER_{{ id }}_{{ key }} where {{ id }} is the upper case form of the server identifier and {{ key }} is the key to define. For example I can define token for release_galaxy by setting ANSIBLE_GALAXY_SERVER_RELEASE_GALAXY_TOKEN=secret_token.
trans-unit.target: 除了在 ansible.cfg 文件中定义之外，还可以将这些服务器选项定义为环境变量。环境变量的格式为 ANSIBLE_GALAXY_SERVER_{{ id }}_{{ key }} ，其中 {{ id }} 是服务器标识符的大写形式，而 {{ key }} 是定义的密钥。例如，我可以通过设置 ANSIBLE_GALAXY_SERVER_RELEASE_GALAXY_TOKEN=secret_token 来为 release_galaxy 定义 token 。

trans-unit.source: As well as defining these server options in the ansible.cfg file, you can also define them as environment variables. The environment variable is in the form ANSIBLE_GALAXY_SERVER_{{ id }}_{{ key }} where {{ id }} is the upper case form of the server identifier and {{ key }} is the key to define. For example I can define token for release_galaxy by setting ANSIBLE_GALAXY_SERVER_RELEASE_GALAXY_TOKEN=secret_token.
trans-unit.target: 除了在 ansible.cfg 文件中定义这些服务器选项外，还可以将它们定义为环境变量。环境变量的格式为 ANSIBLE_GALAXY_SERVER_{{ id }}_{{ key }} ，其中 {{ id }} 是服务器标识符的大写形式，而 {{ key }} 是定义的密钥。例如，我可以通过设置 ANSIBLE_GALAXY_SERVER_RELEASE_GALAXY_TOKEN=secret_token 来为 release_galaxy 定义 token 。

trans-unit.source: As with all dynamic inventory scripts, the script can be executed directly, passed as a parameter to the ansible command, or passed directly to ansible-playbook using the -i option. No matter how it is executed the script produces JSON representing all of the hosts found in your Azure subscription. You can narrow this down to just hosts found in a specific set of Azure resource groups, or even down to a specific host.
trans-unit.target: 与所有动态清单脚本一样,可以直接执行该脚本,将其作为参数传递给 ansible 命令,或使用 -i 选项直接传递给 ansible-playbook。无论以何种方式执行,该脚本都会生成代表 Azure 订阅中发现的所有主机的 JSON。您可以将范围缩小到只在特定的 Azure 资源组集合中找到的主机,甚至缩小到特定的主机。

trans-unit.source: As with any effort to troubleshoot it’s important to simplify the test case as much as possible.
trans-unit.target: 与进行故障排除一样，尽可能简化测试用例也很重要。

trans-unit.source: As with most Ansible modules, the default states of the Packet modules are idempotent, meaning the resources in your project will remain the same after re-runs of a playbook. Thus, we can keep the packet_sshkey module call in our playbook. If the public key is already in your Packet account, the call will have no effect.
trans-unit.target: 与大多数Ansible模块一样，Packet模块的默认状态是幂等的，这意味着重新运行剧本后，项目中的资源将保持不变。因此，我们可以将 packet_sshkey 模块调用保留在我们的剧本中。如果公用密钥已经在您的Packet帐户中，则该呼叫将无效。

trans-unit.source: As you can see, ipwrap() did not filter out non-IP address values, which is usually what you want when for example you are mixing IP addresses with hostnames. If you still want to filter out all non-IP address values, you can chain both filters together:

trans-unit.target: 如您所见，即使某些值的主机地址带有CIDR前缀，它们也会被过滤器删除。如果要使用正确的CIDR前缀的主机IP地址（与IPv6寻址相同），可以使用 ipaddr('host') 过滤器：

trans-unit.source: As you can see, the public IPs for our web servers and jumphost has been assigned as variable public_ip directly in the inventory.
trans-unit.target: 如您所见，我们的Web服务器和Jumphost的公共IP已直接在清单中分配为变量 public_ip 。

trans-unit.source: As you can see, we are using the uri module in first task to login into the vCenter server and storing result in the login variable using register. In the second task, using cookies from the first task we are gathering information about the ESXi host system.
trans-unit.target: 如您所见，我们在第一个任务中使用 uri 模块登录vCenter Server，并使用register 将结果存储在 login 变量中。在第二个任务中，使用第一个任务中的cookie，我们将收集有关ESXi主机系统的信息。

trans-unit.source: As you can see, we get different groups of hosts. par1 and ams1 are groups based on location. web_server is a group based on a tag.
trans-unit.target: 如您所见，我们获得了不同的主机组。 par1 和 ams1 是基于位置的组。 web_server 是基于标记的组。

trans-unit.source: As you expand your inventory, roles and playbooks, you should place your Ansible projects under source control. We recommend git for source control. git provides an audit trail, letting you track changes, roll back mistakes, view history and share the workload of managing, maintaining and expanding your Ansible ecosystem. There are plenty of tutorials and guides to using git available.
trans-unit.target: 在扩展清单，角色和剧本时，应将Ansible项目置于源代码控制之下。我们建议使用 git 进行源代码控制。 git 提供了一个审计跟踪，可让您跟踪更改，回滚错误，查看历史记录并分担管理，维护和扩展Ansible生态系统的工作量。有很多使用 git 的教程和指南。

trans-unit.source: As your inventory grows, you may want to group devices by platform. This allows you to specify platform-specific variables easily for all devices on that platform:
trans-unit.target: 随着库存的增长,您可能希望按平台对设备进行分组。这允许您为该平台上的所有设备轻松指定特定平台的变量。

trans-unit.source: At a basic level, playbooks can be used to manage configurations of and deployments to remote machines. At a more advanced level, they can sequence multi-tier rollouts involving rolling updates, and can delegate actions to other hosts, interacting with monitoring servers and load balancers along the way.
trans-unit.target: 在基本层面上,游戏本可用于管理远程机器的配置和部署。在更高级别的层面上,它们可以对涉及滚动更新的多层推出进行排序,并可以将操作委托给其他主机,在此过程中与监控服务器和负载平衡器进行交互。

trans-unit.source: At a more basic level, they can be used to add chaos and excitement to otherwise predictable automation environments.
trans-unit.target: 在更基本的层面上,它们可以用来给原本可预测的自动化环境增加混乱和刺激。

trans-unit.source: At first it tries to import the network when not found it will create network in external provider.
trans-unit.target: 起初,它试图导入网络,当没有找到时,它将在外部提供商中创建网络。
